alert.note: Alert for Cadiz Basin; Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Morongo Basin; Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 10:01AM PST until February 22 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Western Mojave Desert, Eastern Mojave Desert, Morongo Basin and Cadiz Basin. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hazardous travel conditions are expected along Interstate 15 and Interstate 40. The highest gusts are expected to be in areas of elevated terrain.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Cadiz Basin; Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Morongo Basin; Western Mojave Desert
